column1: Smoque BBQ////I heard a lot about this place and finally got to go with my friend. I like this place a lot and I will go back for sure. We were lucky not so much people at the time we went so we had a table right away even though we had 7 people. The service and food were so good I love mac and cheese so much that I ordered it to go as well. I will try the ribs next time :)
